npc_generic.Marjorie Hales: A photorealistic medium shot of a 78-year-old woman with a stooped posture reflecting her age. She features sharp, piercing blue eyes set in pale, deeply wrinkled skin, with silver-white hair pulled back into a neat, severe bun. She is wearing a textured knitted cardigan over a modest blouse and wire-frame glasses. Her expression is blunt and observant, with thin lips pursed slightly, conveying a traditional and critical nature. The lighting is natural window light, highlighting the texture of the wool and the deep lines of her face, captured on 35mm film.
npc_generic.Earl Peterson: A cinematic portrait of an 81-year-old retired farmer, tall but shrunken by time. He has weathered, sun-tanned skin with deep crevices and gray eyes that look distant. He has thinning white hair and strong, calloused hands. He is wearing a faded, checkered flannel shirt and worn blue jeans that show heavy use. His expression is stubborn yet nostalgic, looking off-camera as if remembering the past. The lighting is warm golden hour sunlight, emphasizing the rough texture of his skin and clothes.
npc_generic.Aaliyah Flores: A candid shot of a 26-year-old woman with a slender build and warm brown skin. She has curly dark brown hair tied in a messy, artistic bun and expressive dark brown eyes. She wears a delicate silver nose ring and casual, paint-splattered clothing, with visible ink stains on her fingers and an artistic tattoo on her forearm. Her demeanor is introverted and perceptive, looking down at a sketchbook with focused intensity. The lighting is soft and diffused, typical of a coffee shop, highlighting the ink textures on her hands.
npc_generic.Hassan Karim: A photorealistic portrait of a 34-year-old man with a medium build and olive skin. He has a well-groomed black beard and short, neatly styled black hair. He is dressed in a crisp, neat button-up shirt. His dark brown eyes are kind, and he offers a warm, genuine smile that conveys patience and diplomacy. The lighting is bright and even, reflecting a welcoming grocery store environment, captured with sharp focus on his facial hair texture.
npc_generic.Chloe Hart: A glamorous, high-contrast shot of a 50-year-old woman with a curvy figure and vibrant dyed red hair styled in waves. She has fair skin with freckles, bright green eyes accentuated by heavy mascara, and wears bold red lipstick. She is dressed in a low-cut top that suggests confidence. Her expression is flirty and bold, with a big infectious laugh and visible age lines around her eyes and mouth. The lighting is slightly dramatic, highlighting her makeup and hair texture.
npc_generic.Derek Cole: A relaxed medium shot of a 29-year-old bartender with an athletic build. He has short brown hair, light stubble, and hazel eyes. His forearms are covered in sleeve tattoos, visible as he wears a casual t-shirt. He has an easy, charming smile and a warm, approachable demeanor, leaning casually against a wooden counter. The lighting is warm and ambient, typical of a bar setting, emphasizing the ink on his arms and the wood grain of the counter.
npc_generic.Linda Cho: A gentle portrait of a 42-year-old woman with East Asian features and a petite build. She has short black hair in a practical bob and tired but kind dark brown eyes. She is wearing practical medical scrubs. Her skin is smooth but shows fine stress lines, and she offers a soft, caring smile that conveys resilience and efficiency. The lighting is sterile but softened, highlighting the fabric of the scrubs and her gentle expression.
npc_generic.Omar Reed: A gritty, textured shot of a 37-year-old mechanic with a muscular build and dark brown skin. He has short black hair and deep brown eyes set in a weathered face. He wears a faded baseball cap and grease-stained work clothes, with permanent oil stains on his strong hands. His expression is blunt and practical, looking directly at the camera with a stoic loyalty. The lighting is high-contrast, emphasizing the grease, sweat, and grime of a garage environment.
npc_generic.Rita Alvarez: A serene full-body shot of a 31-year-old yoga instructor with an athletic, toned build. She has long dark brown hair in a braid and smooth brown skin. She wears form-fitting yoga attire that highlights her flexibility. Her expression is centered and peaceful, with warm brown eyes and a calm demeanor. The lighting is soft and natural, suggesting a studio with large windows, capturing the smooth texture of her skin and the fabric of her sportswear.
npc_generic.Caleb Morris: A candid shot of a 23-year-old man with a thin, lanky build and pale skin. He has messy brown hair and dark circles under tired blue eyes. He wears an oversized hoodie and slouches visibly. His expression is sleepy and awkward, perhaps stifling a yawn or smirking sarcastically, capturing a procrastination vibe. The lighting is cool and dim, perhaps from a screen or fluorescent store lights, highlighting the bags under his eyes.
npc_generic.Gladys Monroe: A detailed close-up of an 84-year-old woman with a frail build. She has snow-white hair in a neat bun and pale, wrinkled skin. She wears a floral print dress and a small golden cross necklace, leaning on a steady wooden cane. Her soft blue eyes behind bifocals convey a pious warmth, though her set jaw hints at quiet judgment. The lighting is soft and church-like, emphasizing the floral pattern and the metallic glint of the cross.
npc_generic.Toby Finch: A dynamic shot of a 40-year-old mail carrier with a lean, wiry build. He has windburned, ruddy cheeks, thinning brown hair, and gray-blue eyes. He wears a postal uniform with a slightly crooked cap and sensible walking shoes. His face is weatherbeaten, and he has a friendly, reliable expression, looking as if he is greeting a neighbor. The lighting is bright outdoor sunlight, casting harsh shadows that accentuate his weathered skin.
npc_generic.Ralph Dugan: A wide shot of a 52-year-old man with a large build and a big belly. He has thinning brown hair combed over, a thick mustache, and ruddy skin. He wears a worn vintage bowling shirt that stretches over his frame. His expression is jolly and loud, with a booming laugh and a friendly smile, though his eyes hold a hint of stubbornness. The lighting is the colorful, neon-hued ambiance of a bowling alley, highlighting the sheen on his shirt.
npc_generic.Yelena Kovacs: A sharp, professional portrait of a 45-year-old woman with a slender build and pale Eastern European features. She has a sharp dark brown bob haircut and wears stylish rectangular glasses. She is dressed in a crisp, professional blouse. Her expression is stern and guarded, with thin lips and precise makeup, conveying dry wit and efficiency. The lighting is cool and office-like, emphasizing the crisp lines of her hair and clothing.
npc_generic.Logan Pierce: A serious medium shot of a 33-year-old police deputy with an athletic build. He has short brown hair in a regulation cut, fair skin, and a short, well-trimmed beard. He wears a standard police uniform. His blue eyes are tired but alert, and his hand rests near his belt, conveying a protective and conflicted demeanor. The lighting is dramatic, perhaps flashing red and blue, highlighting the texture of the uniform badge and his serious jawline.
npc_generic.Angela Browning: A formidable portrait of a 41-year-old security guard with a broad-shouldered, muscular build. She has a military-style buzzcut and dark circles under sharp hazel eyes. She wears a security uniform that fits tightly across her strong frame. Her expression is no-nonsense and observant, with a clenched jaw and a tired but protective gaze. The lighting is the flat, artificial glare of a mall, emphasizing the fatigue in her eyes.
npc_generic.Tyler Voss: A slouching portrait of a 24-year-old arcade attendant with a lanky, thin build. He has messy dark brown hair and tired green eyes with slight stubble on his pale skin. He wears a faded band t-shirt and a lanyard cluttered with keys. His posture is laid-back and avoidant, looking away from the camera with a nerdy, introverted vibe. The lighting is the colorful glow of arcade cabinets, reflecting off his face.
npc_generic.Mina Patel: A confident medium shot of a 29-year-old woman with a petite, slender build and South Asian features. She has long black hair in a tight ponytail and smooth brown skin with precise winged eyeliner. She wears a dark apron dusted with pretzel flour over professional clothes. Her expression is efficient and sarcastic, with a sharp, ambitious gleam in her dark brown eyes. The lighting is bright food court lighting, highlighting the flour texture on her apron.
npc_generic.Ryan Goldstein: A candid shot of a 26-year-old sales clerk with a medium athletic build and fair skin. He has styled light brown hair, a neatly trimmed beard, and modern glasses. He wears a polo shirt with a store logo and is constantly checking a smartwatch. His expression is restless and chatty, with a fake customer-service smile masking boredom. The lighting is sleek and modern, reflecting the high-tech aesthetic of a mobile store.
npc_generic.Clara Sorensen: A colorful portrait of a 21-year-old barista with an artistic, bohemian style. She has fair skin with subtle freckles and hair dyed pastel pink and blue in a messy bun. She wears an apron covered in enamel pins, and her nose is pierced. Her expression is playful and intuitive, with a gentle smile and bright blue eyes. The lighting is soft and whimsical, highlighting the colors of her hair and the metal texture of her pins.
npc_generic.Nina Carver: A tough, gritty shot of a 34-year-old cook with a broad-shouldered, strong build. She has tan skin and dark brown hair tied back in a bandana. She wears a faded bowling-themed t-shirt and a grease-stained apron. Her arms show muscular definition from work. Her expression is blunt and dependable, with a soft-heartedness hidden behind a tough exterior. The lighting is the warm, greasy glow of a snack bar grill.
npc_generic.Eddie \"Pins\" Logan: A quiet portrait of a 47-year-old mechanic with a slightly overweight build and pale skin. He has a receding brown hairline and thick glasses. He wears grease-stained blue coveralls. His brown eyes are gentle and kind, and he offers an unassuming, awkward smile. His hands are permanently stained with oil. The lighting is dim and industrial, capturing the texture of the dirty coveralls and the machinery in the background.
npc_generic.Marshall Gibb: A charismatic shot of a 39-year-old bartender with a tall frame and an immaculate dark beard. He has dark brown hair with some gray and warm hazel eyes. He wears casual bar attire with rolled-up sleeves revealing forearm tattoos. His expression is welcoming and magnetic, with a charming smile that hides a noncommittal nature. The lighting is moody bar lighting, emphasizing the tattoos and his groomed beard.
npc_generic.Marta Delgado: A dignified portrait of a 47-year-old cleaner with a sturdy build and brown skin. She has black hair pulled back and tired dark brown eyes. She wears simple, functional cleaning clothes. Her hands are weathered from hard work. Her expression is quiet and observant, conveying a sense of invisibility and hard work. The lighting is low-key, perhaps the after-hours lighting of an empty building.
npc_generic.Grant Miller: A rugged outdoor shot of a 39-year-old road crew worker with a muscular build. He has tan, weathered skin with permanent tan lines and dirty blonde hair under a hard hat. He wears a high-visibility yellow vest and dusty work boots. His expression is gruff and sarcastic, with a dependable set to his jaw. The lighting is harsh midday sun, highlighting the dust on his clothes and the sweat on his brow.
npc_generic.Zoey Barnes: A restless portrait of a 19-year-old waitress with a slender build. She has bleached blonde hair with dark roots showing in a high ponytail and bright green eyes with heavy eyeliner. She wears a waitress uniform and has chipped black nail polish. Her expression is chatty and sensitive, gazing longingly out a window, capturing a desire to escape. The lighting is the retro neon glow of a diner.

npc_roster.Sarah Madison: A photorealistic medium shot of a 26-year-old woman with a soft, youthful complexion and a creative spirit. She is wearing a loose, bohemian-style blouse with visible fabric weave and paint-stained denim jeans. Her expression is gentle and welcoming, with a warm, kind smile that crinkles the corners of her hazel eyes. The lighting is natural and warm, highlighting the texture of the paint on her skin.
npc_roster.Scarlet Carter: A polished, cinematic portrait of a 38-year-old teacher. She has brown hair styled professionally and wears glasses that frame mature green eyes. She is dressed in organized, professional attire that is modest yet feminine. Her posture is confident and graceful, but her expression holds a tight, controlled warmth, hinting at a hidden internal struggle for perfection. npc_roster.Steve Kallio: A candid shot of a 15-year-old boy with a developing athletic build. He has a clean-cut appearance with short hair and adolescent features. He avoids direct eye contact, conveying a deep sense of naivety and shelter. The lighting is soft and diffuse, capturing the vulnerability in his expression.
npc_roster.Tessa: A dynamic outdoor shot of a 35-year-old woman with an athletic, toned build. She has shoulder-length tousled blonde hair and bright blue eyes. npc_roster.Tim Thompson: A moody, low-key portrait of a 17-year-old boy with a lean, lanky build and pale skin. He has messy dark brown hair and dark circles under intense, observant gray eyes. npc_roster.Tom Kunitz: A clinical, high-detail shot of a 15-year-old boy in a hospital bed. He is pale and thin, with light brown hair that has grown long. The lighting is the harsh, sterile white of a hospital room, capturing the fragility of his condition.
npc_roster.Agnes Montgomery: A soft-focus portrait of a 29-year-old woman with fair porcelain skin and a slender, graceful build. Her expression is a kind, disarming smile that hides a perverse undertone, with delicate hands positioned gently. The lighting is warm and ambient, suggesting a spa environment.
npc_roster.Alex Sturm: A tense medium shot of a 13-year-old boy with a tall, athletic build. He has dark hair and conflicted eyes. His expression is a mix of loyalty and secret rebellion, betraying inner turmoil. The lighting is natural but casts shadows across his face, symbolizing his internal conflict.
npc_roster.Anna Thompson: A poignant portrait of a 7-year-old girl in a wheelchair. She has a fragile, small body with pale, delicate skin and thin limbs. npc_roster.Caty Kunitz: A tired, empathetic portrait of a 38-year-old woman with fair skin showing stress lines. npc_roster.Isabella Ruiz: A glamorous, attention-seeking shot of a 31-year-old woman with an alluring, fit figure and a large bust. She has blonde hair and innocent blue eyes.
